title: "VLAD SUCKS!! DON'T PLAY HIM!!" Vladimir got played in LCS. "VLAD OP!! GONNA PLAY HIM EVERY GAME!!"
body: People who have attitudes like this needs an instant 14 days suspension....

replies.body: As funny as that would be, it would remove around 50 percent of the player base lol.
https://cdn.meme.am/cache/instances/folder566/250x250/55968566.jpg
At least then I wouldn't have boosted ADCs.

until I play it :) 

I mean you are safe because you are in na, but there is probably a player like me in there as well.

This happens to every champion that is rarely seen in lcs get picked up by a good player.

God i hate metaslaves.
then the champ get's nerfed in a spot that wasn't even the problem for it's boosted win rate. Affecting those that played said champion uniquely.
lol happned with my malz supp. i do it its troll lcs does it im copying them and riot nerfs him and malz isnt good at supp as well

but Vlad has always been too strong ? 
free health 
free health 
more free health 
double damage for you and your team
and unstoppable escape

But no one gives a shit about those strengths. Only when he gets played in lcs, NOW everyone gives a shit about him. 

Ziggs also experienced the exact same thing when his W got buffed but no one gives a shit about it, and is now commonly played at Bot lane due to him getting played in LCS 10 months after his buff.

at least for Ziggs
he has to land skill shots, so it takes some effort
I doubt a turret knows how to side-step a skillshot satchel.

You're getting off topic my good sir.

This isn't a Vladimir vs. Ziggs balance thread, remember? XD

> [{quoted}](name=BeatzBoyFTW,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=BJLAq4AR,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2017-03-19T16:05:21.084+0000)
>
> But no one gives a shit about those strengths. Only when he gets played in lcs, NOW everyone gives a shit about him. 
> 
> Ziggs also experienced the exact same thing when his W got buffed but no one gives a shit about it, and is now commonly played at Bot lane due to him getting played in LCS 10 months after his buff.

Ziggs was used because of the pushing power rivaled all adc's. not strictly just the satchel charge. it was just better than most adc's except Varus and jhin. One if not both were more than likely to get banned.

I used to play Ziggs bot lane before it was cool. (I mained top lane and had mid as my second, so it didn't come up often though.) The thing is that Silver and Bronze players don't get to be the revolutionaries because noone thinks they have gameplay skills worth shit, but Ziggs has been able to 3-shot towers since the update in 6.9 (with buffed passive AP ratio and Satchel execute), and yet bot lane Ziggs didn't become a popular choice until a Challenger player picked it up and did extremely well (I don't think it was LCS in this case).

MF support came out of LCS though, and she still has a 2.2% popularity in the support role to this day.
Imagine if they actually played Teemo in LCS.
They did once, he was played by a team as a joke since they had no chance at finals, he carried the game... in LCS,  they just didn't know how to fucking deal with him...
I need a link to this game match.
Been playing mostly teemo myself so I'd be free and clear of that bullshit.
Played him and did well*

LeBlanc nerfed. Riot destroyed it. And the usual.

Still played in LCS. Oh, she is still a beast. Nerf her more.

Fixed.
Fuck LC$

You realize that Vlad recently got some balance changes to his kit, right? They made his AD higher and autoattack more fluid so its easier to CS in lane, and they increased the base Q while nerfing the empowered Q making him safer to play (you dont get the amazing burst of the empowered Q, but you dont fall into uselessness without it). 

But no, lets ignore the fact that Riot made his bread-and-butter skill a lot more forgiving and QQ about the LCS.

STOP IT! , these things did not happen

vlad sucks, dont play him 

<3

I remember these people saying Vladimir got fucked worse than morde did with the Rylais nerfs and that was the reason he was pure garbage tier now. I personally always found Vladimir really strong because of how his ult can change games when used properly.
It's almost as if that is how life works.
Typical gameplay QQ post

I hate Vlad. Always hated him. Cannot stand him. He loses me games. Always picked into champs who counter him. Cannot win with this useless 0 damage trash champ. 

I am talking about Solo Queue players not Pro players picking him up. He only works in the hands of 1.5% of players.
But Plat is about top 1.5% of players

>"VLAD SUCKS!!"

http://31.media.tumblr.com/7143a670544381ee0dac141ca1d38614/tumblr_mwqahaR91Q1rh2tw8o1_400.gif
i thought vlad was op already so my opinion of him hasn't changed

People should really follow this adive: 
STOP
WATCHING
THE LCS
why? 1- It fucks the meta 2- riot pumps almost all of it's money in it in a pretty useless pattern, while this money could actually be reinvested in the game 3- you encourage riot's laziness: with LCS, they don't even have to work to get money 4- it's useless 5- it's not like you actually get any fun from it, compared to a game that couldve be balanced without it

If people starts to boycot the LCS, then maybe the game could actually improve
Vladimir shouldn't be nerved. however the fact that he obtains spirit visage gets on my nerves sometimes :/ Many ppl go for gun blade but I go for spirit visage to ensure max amount of hp healed.

I main {{champion:429}} ... I bet the moment she get's picked in LCS and wins that game because the guy played her very well she will be Pick/Ban and get's nerfed like before. I'am pretty happy she isn't a known OP champ, or even considered meta, so she wont get banned or nerfed, rather buffed

Pro players are known to play flavors of the month that Sneaky even admits it himself. Remember when release Tahm Kench was busted and how no pro player decided to play him for a long time? I remember when pro players also said TK was shit until they actually played him. 

The biggest problem in the LCS is that they dont actually take advantage of champion synergy. Remember that one game when the wild card team picked Anivia and Poppy and utilized their wall/slam in its perfection and won against one of the top teams? 

There is so much potential but they're not utilizing them.
Exactly how I felt with MF. No one used her (her pick rate was pretty average) until she was picked in LCS then everyone started going MF and now she's nerfed to the point her Q barely does a thjng
Nah vlad still sucks
Unless you're a diamond level player, Vlad does suck. But that won't stop me from trying! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Vlad got buffed and LeBlanc in the regions she has been played and won they are playing in the patch before the nerf. Maybe instead of making this type of threads you should look at how the champion was when people were saying those things
